title: logic screen not appear after i press "launch" (windows 7)
body: i can open the "alpha client" just fine.. but when i try to open the normal one.. it bring up the  default screen where i press "launch" and when i press "launch" it closes that screen and.. doesn't ever open the login screen...

replies.body: Your directory might have security settings enabled preventing it from launching.  Check out the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your settings and restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
